channel.title: Phaseolus Vulgaris on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Phaseolus Vulgaris on funPlantGenes

item.title: PvERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PHAVU_007G193300g Gene Symbol: PvERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR15 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Transcription Factors PvERF15 and PvMTF-1 Form a Cadmium Stress Transcriptional Pathway.

item.title: PvLOX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvLOX6 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 6 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Isolated the cDNA of a novel chloroplast-targeted Phaseolus vulgaris LOX, (PvLOX6).

item.title: PvMTF-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvMTF-1 Gene Name: METAL RESPONSE ELEMENT-BINDING TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Transcription Factors PvERF15 and PvMTF-1 Form a Cadmium Stress Transcriptional Pathway.

item.title: PvRbohB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Phvulv091013731 Gene Symbol: PvRbohB Gene Name: NADPH oxidase gene Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: RbohB, a Phaseolus vulgaris NADPH oxidase gene, enhances symbiosome number, bacteroid size, and nitrogen fixation in nodules and impairs mycorrhizal colonization.

item.title: PvTIFY10C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Phvul.002G002000.1 Gene Symbol: PvTIFY10C Gene Name: TIFY transcription factor Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Common bean (Phaseolus vulgarisL.
